title: Public transport for Round 23 of the 2024 AFL Season
articleContent:
Public transport is the best way to get to the game during Round 23 of the 2024 AFL season!

We're running extra services to and from the MCG and Marvel Stadium.

Plan your trip to the game using Journey planner.

Round 23 matches

Essendon v Sydney, Marvel Stadium, Friday 16 August at 7:40pm

Collingwood v Brisbane, MCG, Saturday 17 August at 4:35pm

St Kilda v Geelong, Marvel Stadium, Saturday 17 August at 7:30pm

Western Bulldogs v North Melbourne, Marvel Stadium, Sunday 18 August at 1:10pm

Hawthorn v Richmond, MCG, Sunday 18 August at 3:20pm

Plan your journey

Set your location to plan your journey to and from Marvel Stadium or the MCG.

Before you travel

We strongly encourage you to register your myki. With a registered myki you can protect your myki balance if the card is lost or stolen, check your travel history and manage multiple myki cards in the one account.

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.
